game.description: The ancient temple has been sealed, but the powerful artifact within is needed to defeat the darkness. Find a way to unlock the temple and retrieve the artifact.
game.objective: Retrieve the artifact from the ancient temple

tasks.description: Meet with Thorne, the local expert on ancient ruins.
tasks.location: Whiteridge Village, in front of Thorne's Hut
tasks.objective: Get Thorne's help to find a way into the temple

tasks.description: Gather three ancient keys hidden within the nearby ruins.
tasks.objective: Collect all three ancient keys to unlock the temple entrance

tasks.description: Solve the puzzle within the temple to claim the artifact.
tasks.location: Ancient Temple, inside the sealed chamber
tasks.objective: Unlock the pedestal with the artifact using Thorne's knowledge and the collected keys

game.title: The Lost Temple of Eldarath
